name: CodeTower
description:
CodeTower is a Tower Defense coding game where the towers are driven by Python code.

Stop the minions waves with your favorite editing software  !

You can :

  • build an archer tower
  • build a mage tower

It's a early prototype. It is planned to add more functions :

  • upgrade tower,
  • choose dynamically the most appropriate techno (archer tower) or spell (mage tower),
  • activate/desactivate tower (multiple roads),
  • dynamic targeting for the archer tower, 
  • buff spell for the mage tower,
  • barrack,
  • ...

CodeTower is an open source software.

  • Distributed under the terms of the GPLv3 license,
  • The game engine is open source : Blender / UPBGE,
  • Source repository : Gitlab,
  • Assets under CC0 license : Kenney and Kaylousberg.
